page.title: User Journey
page.subtitle: See how our users achieve success

steps.title: Step 1: Discover
steps.description: Users find Khulega.online through search, social media, or word of mouth.

steps.title: Step 2: Explore
steps.description: Browse our services, shop items, and job opportunities.

steps.title: Step 3: Engage
steps.description: Sign up, make purchases, or apply for jobs that match their skills.

steps.title: Step 4: Succeed
steps.description: Achieve their goals with our reliable platform and support.
